dict.string: This app needs access to your health data to provide emergency assistance and monitor your wellbeing during critical situations. Heart rate, activity, and sleep data help assess your condition and provide context for emergency responders.
This app may need to update your health data during emergency responses to track vital signs and recovery status.
Access to clinical health records helps provide medical context during emergency situations.
This app needs microphone access to detect voice trigger words for hands-free emergency activation and to make emergency calls when needed.
This app uses speech recognition to detect voice trigger words for hands-free emergency activation. All speech processing happens on-device for privacy.
